menu.item-veg-description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in spicy aromatic spinach based gravy served with 2 parathas + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Mildy spicy chicken pieces cooked in flavourful aromatic spices in a spinach based gravy served with 2 paratahs + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Okra cooked in aromatic homeblend spice mix with petals of onion served with 2 parathas + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A popular Goan dish. Chicken marinated and cooked in an aromatic, mildy spicy fresh spice mix served with 2 parathas + rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: A street food from the north of India. Chickpea cooked in hot & flavour packed spices served with 2 baturas (fried Indian flatbread) + pickled onions + green chutney
menu.item-nonveg-description: Aromatic basmati rice teamed with lip smacking prawns cooked in a home made spice blend served with yogurt dip + achar + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Cashew cooked in a creamy mildly spicy onion & tomato based gravy with aromatic home ground spices served with 2 lacha parathas + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A mildy spicy Parsi dish made of a mix of different lentils, veggies and chicken cooked together in a home made spice blend served with rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: A mix of different veggies  and dry fruits cooked in ghee with aromatic whole spices served with yogurt dip + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Slow cooked lamb dish made with an aromatic, mildly hot spice blend in an onion & tomato based gravy with some petals of onion served with 2 parathas + papad + side salad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Fried vegetarian balls made of potato and Indian cottage cheese cooked in a creamy flavourful onion & tomato based, mildy spicy, gravy served with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Soft succulent chicken pieces cooked with aromatic spices, fried onion and fragrant basmati rice served with yogurt dip and papad

menu.item-veg-description: Indian flatbread stuffed with potatoes, onion and spices and served with tomato chutney + achar + side salad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Minced chicken cooked in flavourful Indian spices stuffed in Indian flatbread served with tomato chutney + achar + side salad

menu.item-veg-description: Traditional dish from Kerala made with a mix of differnent root vegetables cooked in flavourful coconut milk based gravy served with rice + acahar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Traditional chicken stew from Kerala cooked with chicken, veggies, spices and coconut milk served with rice + achar + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Chickpeas and Indian cottage cheese cooked in aromatic basmati rice with tangy achar flavour served with yogurt dip + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Aromatic Basmati rice cooked to perfection in a broth made with chicken and fragrant spices served with beetroot raita + achar + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in flavourful onion & toamto based thick gravy with a drizzle of cream served with 2 parathas + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A classic dish from the coastal region of Maharashtra. Mackerel cooked in a coconut based gravy with spicy Malvani spice mix and served with rice + side salad + papad
